name: gpt_3
template: {sentence1} {sentence2} Question: Is the word "{word}" used in the same sense in the two sentences above?

name: gpt_3_yes_no
template: {sentence1} {sentence2} Question: Is the word "{word}" used in the same sense in the two sentences above? Yes, No?

name: affirmation
template: Sentence A: {sentence1} Sentence B: {sentence2} "{word} has a similar meaning in sentence A and B. True or False?

name: grammar_homework
template: Decide whether the word "{word}" is used with the same meaning in the two following sentences. Answer by Yes or No. {sentence1} {sentence2}

name: polysemous
template: The word "{word}" has multiple meanings. Does it have the same meaning in sentences 1 and 2? Yes or No? Sentence 1: {sentence1} Sentence 2: {sentence2}

name: question_context
template: Determine if the word "{word}" is used in the same way in the two sentences below. {sentence1} {sentence2}

name: question_meaning
template: Determine if the word "{word}" have the same meanining in the two sentences below. {sentence1} {sentence2}

name: question_meaning_yes_no
template: Does the word "{word}" have the same meanining in these two sentences? Yes, No? {sentence1} {sentence2}

name: same_sense
template: Sentence 1: {sentence1} Sentence 2: {sentence2} Determine whether the word "{word}" is used in the same sense in both sentences. Yes or No?
